t.t-value: ['Interview Feedback_T_Tel','Interview Feedback_T_Tel - Development','Interview Feedback_T_F2F','Interview Feedback_T_F2F - Development','Interview Feedback_NT_Tel','Interview Feedback_NT_F2F','Interview Feedback_HR','New Interview Feedback_HR']
['Scoresheet Practical Test - Testing','Scoresheet Practical test-DBA','Scoresheet Practical test-DBA-V2']

tbody.t-if: doc.survey_id.title.strip() in technical or doc.survey_id.title.strip() in new_interview_form
doc.survey_id.title.strip()== web_design or doc.survey_id.title.strip() == graphic_design or doc.survey_id.title.strip()==bss

tr.t-if: doc.survey_id.title.strip() in sqst or doc.survey_id.title.strip() in dqst or doc.survey_id.title.strip() in [web_design,graphic_design,bss]

t.t-if: doc.survey_id.title.strip() in technical or doc.survey_id.title.strip() in [graphic_design] or doc.survey_id.title.strip() == bss or doc.survey_id.title.strip() in sqst or doc.survey_id.title.strip() in dba_new or doc.survey_id.title.strip() in dqst or doc.survey_id.title.strip() in dqst or doc.survey_id.title.strip() == web_design

td.span: Total Score of each parameter is 100.
